metadata.title: CVE-2018-19827 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In LibSass 3.5.5, a use-after-free vulnerability exists in the SharedPtrclass in SharedPtr.cpp (or SharedPtr.hpp) that may cause a denial ofservice (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19827` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsass0 - 3.4.8-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libsass package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.4.8-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
